The original post attributes the cause of working all weekend to the speaker's own situation and feelings, using the phrase "slave labor." This is an internal attributional style. To transfer the post to an external attributional style, we can attribute the cause to something external, such as the job or the employer.

Transferred Post: "Working all weekend? It's a tough job market out there, and sometimes we have to put in extra hours to stay competitive. But I'm still gonna miss my girl Goshy when she leaves for Poland on Sunday 😢 Three months is a looong time 🙃"
